Posts.Content: I'm on my third month of Tykerb and Herceptin.  Metastatistis continued on Tykerb alone but isn't with the Herceptin.  I was Herceptin resistant after 9 months of it.  I'm now adding scorpion venom, Escozine, because my oncologist basically said there isn'tanything else they can do for me if this doesn't work.  I'm feeling really good, symptom free other than a little tired.  Any thoughts?
Posts.Title: is Tykerb Better Than Herceptin?

Posts.Content: I am a stage IV with metastistis to my lungs.  The oncologist told me to go ahead and try whatever I want.  I also am HER-2 positive and Herceptin resistant. I have just started on Escozine, a blue scorpion venom.  See Medolife.com .  It is totally natural but is currently seeking FDA approval here in the US and a patent is currently pending.  After two weeks, I have 3 flags removed from my blood work and my WBC have come up .3 points.  This is the first sign of anything positive I have had for over two years. I am on disability so I was blessed to have several people come to me to sponsor my venom payment since insurance doesn't cover it.  I also checked it out very well and could not find any negative statistical information anywhere.  So far I'm a believer!  Good Luck and God Bless.
Posts.Title: Are there any stage IV breast cancer survivors thru alternative treatments????

Posts.Content: It has been almost two years since I wrote my response and now I am cancer free!!
